abstract: As Google prepares for talks with the Chinese government over censorship laws, the company has indicated that it would like to retain much of its operations in the country.
snippet: As Google prepares for talks with the Chinese government over censorship laws, the company has indicated that it would like to retain much of its operations in the country.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Few people say they think Google’s Chinese-language search engine will survive the company’s confrontation with China.

headline.main: Google Hopes to Retain Business Unit in China
headline.print_headline: Google Hopes to Retain Business Unit in China

abstract: China has told some banks to limit lending and will restrict overall credit growth in the nation to $1.1 trillion this year, banking regulator Liu Mingkang said.
snippet: China has told some banks to limit lending and will restrict overall credit growth in the nation to $1.1 trillion this year, banking regulator Liu Mingkang said.
lead_paragraph: China has told some banks to limit lending and will restrict overall credit growth in the nation to 7.5 trillion renminbi ($1.1 trillion) this year, said the banking regulator, Liu Mingkang.

headline.main: China Orders Some Banks to Rein in Loans
